title: Discovery & Definition
description: A collaborative deep-dive to align on technical requirements, data schemas, and user interface designs before development begins.

title: Development & Implementation
description: Building the core application features, including the file uploader, rule definition engine, and the primary visualization dashboard.

title: Testing & Deployment
description: Conducting User Acceptance Testing (UAT) with the finance team to ensure accuracy before deploying the final tool to Cloudflare.

title: Handoff & Training
description: Providing the finance team with comprehensive training materials and live sessions to ensure successful adoption and long-term use.
